verses.verse: <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H5146>Noah<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6509>them,<s%> "Be fruitful, and <S%H7235>multiply,<s%> and <S%H4390>replenish<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

The fear of <S%H4172>you<s%> and the dread of <S%H2844>you<s%> will be on every <S%H2416>animal<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and on every <S%H5775>bird<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky.<s%> Everything that the <S%H127>ground<s%> <S%H7430>teems<s%> <S%H1709>with,<s%> and all the fish of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> are <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
Every moving <S%H7431>thing<s%> that <S%H2416>lives<s%> will be <S%H402>food<s%> for <S%H3418>you.<s%> As the green <S%H6212>herb,<s%> I have given everything to <S%H5414>you.<s%>
<S%H389>But<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> with its <S%H5315>life,<s%> its <S%H1818>blood,<s%> you shall not <S%H398>eat.<s%>

I will <S%H389>surely<s%> <S%H1875>require<s%> your <S%H1818>blood<s%> of your <S%H5315>lives.<s%> At the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of every <S%H2416>animal<s%> I will <S%H1875>require<s%> <S%H3027>it.<s%> At the hand of <S%H120>man,<s%> even at the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of every <S%H120>man<s%>'s <S%H251>brother,<s%> I will <S%H1875>require<s%> the <S%H5315>life<s%> of <S%H120>man.<s%>

Whoever <S%H8210>sheds<s%> <S%H120>man<s%>'s <S%H1818>blood,<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> will be <S%H8210>shed<s%> by <S%H120>man,<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> in his own <S%H6754>image.<s%>
Be <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply.<s%> Increase <S%H8317>abundantly<s%> in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and multiply in <S%H7235>it.<s%>"
<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H5146>Noah<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%> with <S%H559>him,<s%> saying,
"As for <S%H6965>me,<s%> behold, I establish my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H2233>you,<s%> and with your offspring after <S%H310>you,<s%>

and with every <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> that is with <S%H5775>you:<s%> the birds, the <S%H2416>livestock,<s%> and every animal of the <S%H776>earth<s%> with <S%H3318>you,<s%> of all that go out of the <S%H8392>ship,<s%> even every <S%H2416>animal<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

I will <S%H6965>establish<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H1320>you:<s%> all flesh will not be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> any more by the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3999>flood,<s%> neither will there ever again be a <S%H3999>flood<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>"

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "This is the <S%H226>token<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> which <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H5414>make<s%> between me and you and every <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> that is with <S%H5769>you,<s%> for perpetual <S%H1755>generations:<s%>
I <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H7198>rainbow<s%> in the <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and it will be for a <S%H226>sign<s%> of a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> between me and the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
It will <S%H6049>happen,<s%> when I bring a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> over the <S%H776>earth,<s%> that the <S%H7198>rainbow<s%> will be <S%H7200>seen<s%> in the <S%H6051>cloud,<s%>

and I will <S%H2142>remember<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> which is between me and you and every <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> of all <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> will no <S%H5750>more<s%> become a <S%H3999>flood<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> all <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>

The <S%H7198>rainbow<s%> will be in the <S%H6051>cloud.<s%> I will look at <S%H7200>it,<s%> that I may <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H996>and<s%> every <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> of all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> that is on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>"

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> "This is the <S%H226>token<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> which I have <S%H6965>established<s%> between me and all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> that is on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>"

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah<s%> who went <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H8392>ship<s%> were <S%H8035>Shem,<s%> <S%H2526>Ham,<s%> and <S%H3315>Japheth.<s%> <S%H2526>Ham<s%> is the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>
<S%H5146>These<s%> <S%H2490>three<s%> were the sons <S%H376>of<s%> <S%H776>Noah,<s%> and from these, the whole earth was <S%H5310>populated.<s%>
<S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> to be a <S%H376>farmer,<s%> and <S%H5193>planted<s%> a <S%H3754>vineyard.<s%>
He <S%H8354>drank<s%> of the <S%H3196>wine<s%> and got <S%H7937>drunk.<s%> He was <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> his <S%H168>tent.<s%>

<S%H2526>Ham,<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of his <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H2351>outside.<s%>

<S%H8035>Shem<s%> and <S%H3315>Japheth<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H8071>garment,<s%> and <S%H7760>laid<s%> it on <S%H8147>both<s%> their <S%H7926>shoulders,<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> in <S%H3680>backwards,<s%> and covered the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of their <S%H1>father.<s%> Their <S%H6440>faces<s%> were <S%H322>backwards,<s%> and they <S%H7200>didn't<s%> see their <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%>
<S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H3364>awoke<s%> from his <S%H3196>wine,<s%> and <S%H3045>knew<s%> what his <S%H6996>youngest<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> had done to <S%H6213>him.<s%>
He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3667>"Canaan<s%> is <S%H779>cursed.<s%> He will be <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H5650>servants<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers.<s%>"
He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1288>"Blessed<s%> be <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8035>Shem.<s%> Let <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> his <S%H5650>servant.<s%>
May <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6601>enlarge<s%> <S%H3315>Japheth.<s%> Let him <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H8035>Shem.<s%> Let <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> be his <S%H5650>servant.<s%>"
<S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3999>flood.<s%>
All the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah<s%> were <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> then he <S%H4191>died.<s%>
